body.name: Smart Watch - 1.7Inch IPS Full Screen Fitness Watch with Multiple Sport Modes Pedometer Photo Alarm Clock Phone Calls Fitness Smartwatches for Men Women
features: 【Smart Watch】Crafted for those who seek functionality wrapped in elegance, the Smart Watch is your perfect companion for staying connected your fitness journey. With its stainless steel strap and sleek design, it not 𝗈𝗇𝗅𝗒 complements your style but also offers a plethora of features designed to support your active life and keep you informed.

【Bluetooth Connectivity for Seamless Communication】Stay connected on the 𝗀𝗈 with the Bluetooth 5.0 technology. Make phone calls directly from your wrist without needing to pull out your smartphone. Whether you're running errands or exercising, this smartwatch ensures you're just a tap away from important conversations.

【Versatile Notification Management】Never 𝗆𝗂𝗌𝗌 an important update with the smart notification system. It supports a wide array of app, displaying messages and call reminders. Stay informed and respond promptly without having to check your phone constantly.

【Customizable Interface with Multiple Options】Personalize your experience with 6 different user interface options available on the main screen. Match your mood or outfit with a 𝗌𝗐𝗂𝗍𝖼𝗁, enhancing the visual appeal and usability of your smartwatch.

【Durable Design and Long Battery Life】Built to last, the features a robust alloy and ABS material rated IP67 for water and 𝖽𝗎𝗌𝗍 resistance. Enjoy up to 3 days of working time on a single 1.5-hour charge, thanks to its efficient battery and energy-saving features.
